dataIdInfo.idAbs: Verify that data can be sent to Places, and if it is suitable for future syncing
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Regan Sarwas, Alaska Region GIS Team, National Park Service

tool.name: ValidateForPlaces

param.name: feature
param.dialogReference: <p/>The feature class to check. Any ArcGIS feature class can be checked.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The feature class to check. Any ArcGIS feature class can be checked.

param.name: translator
param.expression: {Buildings | Generic | Parking Lots | Points of Interest | Roads | Trails | Other}
param.dialogReference: <p/>The translator to apply to the feature class when it will be uploaded. The translator's feature filter is used to only check the features that will be uploaded.
param.pythonReference: <p/>The translator to apply to the feature class when it will be uploaded. The translator's feature filter is used to only check the features that will be uploaded.

tool.summary: Verify that data can be sent to Places, and if it is suitable for future syncing
tool.usage: Verify that data can be sent to Places, and if it is suitable for future syncing
